ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but only as a reminder for those who have fear,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But as admonition for him who fears --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: it is only a reminder for him who fears Allah;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: for those who have fear (of disobeying God), not to make you, (Muhammad), miserable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except as a reminder for one who fears.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But only as a Reminder to those who fear (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay, it is a reminder to him who fears:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: but only as a reminder to him who tears,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But as a reminder unto him who feareth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but only as an exhortation for him who fears God;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But only as an admonition unto him who feareth. *Chapter: 20
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: but only as an admonition to him who fears [his Lord].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But only as an admonition to those who fear (Allah),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But only as a Reminder to those who fear (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but as a reminder to he who fears.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But only as a reminder for him who fears.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But only as a reminder for those who fear [Allah] -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:3] but, We have revealed it, only to remind, therewith, him who fears, God;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But as a reminder) an admonition (unto him who feareth) unto him who embraces Islam, and We have not revealed it to you in order that you tire yourself,
